footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Xingqiu | Update Date: 11/06/2022 | Editor: Pile6Zero#6228

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Primordial Jade Cutter__ With it's high Crit RATE substat, this weapon is the best offensive option for C6 Xingqiu, as long as ER requirements are met. Not recommended for non-C6 Xingqiu.

__R3+ Sacrificial Sword__ High Energy Recharge substat and a useful passive help ease reaching ER requirements, and allow for an easier offensive build. This weapon does have the drawback of desunching rotations since Xingqiu has a very long skill cooldown at 22s

__Favonius Sword__ This weapon has the same high Energy Recharge substat as Sacrificial Sword, with the added benefit of being able to battery the entire team better. It also doesn't have the drawback of desynching rotations like Sacrifical Sword does, additionally its a great option right from the get go at refinement level 1
